game.name: Chuck Chicken Memory
game.description:
Do you want to improve the brain power and memory abilities of your kids? Are you an arcade puzzle fanatic? We have proudly got you covered with a brand new arcade game where your memory abilities will be tested to the maximum possible level. Do you think that your memory is sharp enough to handle any puzzle challenges? Join Chuck Chicken Memory Match and show off the world that no challenge can beat your mind! Create your best new score and share it with your friends!
When you click the play button, you would spot a stack of hidden pictures in front of you. Click them one by one to remember the order of each image! In this html5 puzzle game, you will get a chance to open two or three pairs of same cards. Try to match your favorite cards in the shortest possible time to create your own huge record! It will be amazing to discover a number of nemesis cards featuring Dex, Don, Dee, Dr Mingo and other cool cards including Wing, Flick, Chuck. 
This fast paced action car theme based game features simple controls, cute animals and crisp gameplay. We are damn sure that this wonderful game from the hit animation series Chuck Chicken will definitely help your kids to improve their memory and knowledge about the cute animals. Check out more mobile phone brain games for kids that are playable on desktop, mobile phones, tablets, iPads, or iPhones!
